website_summaries.verdict: An effective make-up removing cleanser that’s suitable for normal to oily skin.
pros: Lathers, which may give some a feeling of better cleaning action
Creamy texture feels nice on the face
cons: Some customers feel it’s not hydrating enough for those with dry skin

customer_reviews.title: So gentle, so foamy!
customer_reviews.text: A little goes a LONG WAY with this super gentle cleansing foam. A pea-sized amount, lathered with wet hands, foams up and covers the whole face and neck, and rinses off clean, with no tightness. Doesn't dry me out at all, and it's a perfect follow-up to an oil cleanser. One star removed for a nitpicking reason: there are tiny bits of mica added to make the soap look shiny/sparkly, and not only does it seem totally unnecessary, it sometimes gets stuck to your hands, and I would assume the facial skin. I've noticed no irritation from it, but it is an additive purely for cosmetic reasons.
customer_reviews.author: KWatts

customer_reviews.title: Gentle, hydrating, cleansing, but the smell...
customer_reviews.text: I don't have sensitive skin and skin is mostly dry. This facial cleanser feels gentle and very hydrating. It comes out close to the consistancy of a thick lotion. I get zero foaming with this product despite the products description that it is lightly foaming, doesn't bother me but thought I'd mention it. There was one major issue for me personally, thus the 4 instead of 5 star rating. I had been trying to place the smell after using is a few days. It dawned on me today that it definitely, and very unfortunately, smells like baby spit up. It isn't a harshly offensive odor, but it makes me pause applying it to my face...
customer_reviews.author: LB MCA

customer_reviews.title: Not as strong as the foaming cleanser, but good!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try this because I LOVE this brand. I had been using the foaming cleanser for a few months and I absolutely loved it and had no complaints, but I wanted to treat myself to something new. I feel like the foaming cleanser is more of a DEEP clean. I use the cleansing oil to remove makeup, followed by cleanser and this one didn't feel particularly spotless afterwards. It worked much better for me in the morning, when there is less gunk on my face to dissolve.
customer_reviews.author: Jem

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after seeing some suggestions on reddit. The Cerave foaming cleanser was drying me out big time. I have been very impressed with this! I use an oil cleanser first and this is my second cleanser. It foams up very luxuriously and has no SLS. It gentle enough for the eyes and does not strip my skin of moisture. I use this along with the Hada Labo Gokujyn Lotion and I've noticed a dramatic change in my skin texture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for Dry, Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: A little goes a long way. Very gentle. I don’t find that it is very hydrating but I would say that my skin doesn’t feel stripped of moisture after cleansing. For reference I have dry, sensitive, rosacea-prone skin. One thing that bothers me about this listing is how much the price has increased since I started using this. The first time I bought it, it cost $6. The second time I bought it, $12. It now costs nearly $25 and I don’t think it’s the best face wash in that price point.
customer_reviews.author: OllieWog

customer_reviews.title: My favorite face cleanser! Best by far!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many face cleansers, this one is my favorite, and at a very good price. It is one of the most popular cleansers in Japan. It has a slightly foamy/creamy feel to it, but not heavy, in fact it's very light. There is no scent, and it does not dry out your skin nor leave residue, my face feels incredibly clean. You also only need to use a small amount for face and neck. I also use their night cream and day cream. My slight wrinkles have disappeared and I am 57. I have used all the products in the box stores, Sephora, Ulta, then found this on Amazon from Japan, wow. Yes, I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I really love how gentle this cleanser is. It is thick and creamy, so you won't have to use a lot. A little bit goes a long way. It is hydrating, and cleanses your skin and actually locks in moisture. I think it foams up rather well. Like I said, you only need a little bit. Moisten your face and go to town. I usually use mine in the shower. After using my face is always baby soft and I feel more refreshed. My face isn't as dry either.
customer_reviews.author: Rimu

customer_reviews.title: High Quality for budget price
customer_reviews.text: I have always used expensive brand cleaners till I stumbled upon this because I been using lot of Korean products and my face has transformed so I thought I try it. To me almost like checks and balances cleanser. My skin is clean and it dry my face is very sensitive too and it actually helps with my redness too. And the price is unbelievable for a great product. I also bought their brand eye cream and it’s works great too!!
customer_reviews.author: angie2499

customer_reviews.title: Nice cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for a month and it's not broken me out, I have sensitive acne prone skin but, with this cleanser my skin feels moist, supple and acne is under control. Good product, a little goes a long way just a pea size would be enough to make foam for the whole face and neck.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and Hydrating
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this face wash for a few months now. I originally bought it as the part 2 of my double cleansing routine, but I often use it alone when I just want to clean my face and don't feel the need for double cleansing. It's very gentle and not drying at all which many foaming cleaners are known to do. I have sensitive/dry, acne prone skin and this has not given me any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Flores

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best face wash I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: One little tiny pea sized amount makes a whole face-full of creamy, moisturizing, luxurious lather. My face is soft and fresh after each easy-to-rinse wash. I use it twice a day. If I have makeup to remove, I first use the Hada Labo cleansing oil and Then the cleanser. Or sometimes I just use the oil. So far I love the Hada Labo products.
customer_reviews.author: BeenThere

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: I was in love with Kiss My Face Potent and Pure Creamy Face Cleanser for almost 10 years, but it finally got too hard to find, even on Amazon. I researched what I could to find an alternative and settled on this. It works fine--it feels a lot "soapier" than my previous cleanser, but it doesn't seem to overdry my skin. I don't like the smell at all, but it's hard to live up to the wonderful citrus-vanilla scent of my old cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: LLB

customer_reviews.title: Price increases
customer_reviews.text: Face wash is amazing. But this would be the 3rd time I’m ordering and each time the price is higher. Pass.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Miracle label!
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching EVERYWHERE for a product that works for my skin type. I'm both oily and very dry, it's almost patchy! And my problem area is my forehead. I went ahead and ordered this along with the moisturizer and an oil based cleanser as well that was grouped with these products. I washed my face both mornings and nights, and sometimes even double cleansed at night with organic honey. I will never use any other products again. My face is completely different. Sooo smooth like I never thought I would have. This is amazing for me! Will forever buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great Face wash & Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: 36 Female. Dry skin with some oily patches and some blackheads on nose and chin. I ADORE this face wash, it has really helped with my blackheads, is gentle and doesn’t cause any redness or irritation. It’s a great face wash at a great price, especially a Japanese skincare product, with hyaluronic acid. I have tried lots and lots of face wash through my life and this is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: natalie

customer_reviews.title: 😐😐
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about this product...my face is extremely sensitive, after I use this facial soap it feels like I washed my face with coconut oil.....👎👎👎its greasy and I already have oily skin and it feels weird.
customer_reviews.author: Hsu L.

customer_reviews.title: A total win for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I trashed all of my facial cleansers and started using this and my acne prone skin has improved greatly. I do wish I was able to buy it in stores but you only need the smallest amount so the bottle will definitely last a long time. I removes all of my make up and cleans a lot better than most of the products I have tried and I have tried some really expensive products. My skin is so sensitive and breaks out easily. Even cetaphil and cerave bother my skin but this is my holy grail. It doesnt dry out my skin or irritate it. Definitely worth trying!
customer_reviews.author: eamanzo89

customer_reviews.title: Clean, Soft and Stinky.
customer_reviews.text: So far I've only used a few times, it does get rid of all my make up real easy and fast. It's gentle so my face doesn't feel like cardboard after I use it. But to me, it smells like moldy bread. I have a very sensitive sense of smell and every time I use it the smell hits me like a face slap. Would advice pregnant woman who struggle with smells to try it before buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Not as gentle as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: I gave this a try to see if I could get my skin a little cleaner than my usual CeraVe hydrating cleanser. While this certainly made my skin feel really clean - it also made my skin quite irritated and dry, especially on my cheeks. I'm sure if you followed up with toner and moisturizer you would be ok, but unfortunately this just isn't for me.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin H.

customer_reviews.title: Hidden gem of a facewash
customer_reviews.text: This is a great winter facewash! I have acne prone skin that tends to have some dry patches and thus face wash makes my entire face feel soft and smooth! I usually apply it with a “little scrubber” or the foreo silicone thing. It works great with both - it has a great consistency and I am very satisfied with this product!
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: too drying for my rosacea
customer_reviews.text: It took a week of using this for my skin to accept or reject this regimen. Then my face turned red and stung after using the cleanser. Even my hands were dry! That is a sign that my skin does not like this as much as my brain loved the gentle foaming action. Really bummed
customer_reviews.author: jhk

customer_reviews.title: I have VERY dry skin so...
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 3 stars because I love Hada Labo and I can tell this is a good cleanser, but it was a little too drying for me. The only cleanser I seem to be able to use without getting dried out is the Cerave Hydrating Cleanser. I've now learned that anything that foams is just not for me and this does foam a bit. I'll still continue to purchase other Hada Labo products, as they are an excellent brand, especially if they make a strictly cream cleanser with Hyaluronic Acid!
customer_reviews.author: Summer Fun

customer_reviews.title: Not for acne prone skin!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this cleanser. I really did it was so nice and moisturizing and gentle on my sensitive skin. My face always felt so nice after washing. But about 2 weeks into using it I started breaking out and even got cystic acne! Which I rarely ever had problems with before. After doing some research I learned that it has a lot of ingredients that clog pores. Do NOT use this if you have oily skin or acne problems!
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Good at any price!
customer_reviews.text: After spending soooo much money over the years, in search of a cleanser, I found this accidentally and I am so glad I did. This is great for combo skin, not drying out and keeping breakouts at bay. I love the foamy consistency and it only takes a tiny bit to get a great lather. And the price is such a bargain . I'm going to research other items from this line, its that good.
customer_reviews.author: K Stan

customer_reviews.title: Most hydrating cleanser I have used and the cheapest! ...
customer_reviews.text: Most hydrating cleanser I have used and the cheapest! I tried using the Cetaphil Hydrating Cleanser, but even that left my skin dry. Probably because that contains Sodium Lauryl Sulfate. I wanted a basic cleanser without any actives that wouldn't strip my skin of it's natural oils and this definitely fits the bill. Update: still love this cleanser but have noticed it’s now$21?!? That’s very inflated. When I first bought it, it was $7 as an add on if I bought a set amount of stuff. Second time it was a couple dollars more, but wasn’t an add on so I was fine shelling a few more dollars. I suggest not buying it while it’s this high.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmin Khangura

customer_reviews.title: It really is gentle!
customer_reviews.text: I have combination skin that gets very dry in the winter. This is perfect. It cleanses gently but thoroughly; it doesn't strip my skin but also does not make me break out with too much moisture. I doubt I'll be using this during the humid summers my area gets, but any other time of year, it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: R.L.

customer_reviews.title: My Holy Grail
customer_reviews.text: My FAVORITE cleanser of all cleanser. I am a skin care addict. I have tried just about every cleanser out there - cerave, cetaphil, first aid beauty ,neutrogena, and just about everything else that's available. Most of them left me unsatisfied until this beautiful little product entered my life. It is perfect. It cleanses well enough to remove my makeup and dirt from the day, but keeps my skin hydrated unlike most cleansers. My face is soft and clean after every use. The best part is that it has very quickly become my boyfriends absolute favorite too - every time I go out of town he complains that I take it with me. I will purchase over and over again!
customer_reviews.author: Mirtica

customer_reviews.title: Great for Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive dry skin with occasional pimples. I switched to this after using Cetaphil Gentle Skin Cleanser for years. Within a week I no longer had dry skin on my forehead. I have also had zero pimples. Only a tiny amount is necessary so one bottle will go a long way. I foam this between moist hands, apply then rinse with cool water, pat dry, and then apply O Naturals Active Moisturizing Day Cream. Never been so happy with my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Rose

customer_reviews.title: Leaves a film
customer_reviews.text: Leaves a dry filmy feeling. Not for me. Used to use St Ives Fresh Skin until the discontinued it and started making nothing but scrubs. Then I found Yes to carrots fragrance free and its discontinued too. I am very particular and I have never found a daily face wash that worked as well as my old St Ives.
customer_reviews.author: Mad_Sid

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST, PERIOD!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cleanser I have used since Neutrogena's deep cleaning cleanser came out back in the late 90's It works amazingly on my skin. My skin is dark, oily, and sensitive and I would put this cleanser up against any cleanser on the market claiming to do the same for my skin type. I have even tried other cleansers since using this one and I still come back to it. It leaves my skin, clean and fresh, not drying AT ALL!!! For the price this cleanser is an ABSOLUTE STEAL and I have used numerous other cleansers in every range of price, this one still BEATS THEM ALL!!!! Put it on auto :-)
customer_reviews.author: Janaire Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Best cleanser I’ve ever used. For context, I have combo/oily skin with some sensitivity + prone to acne. This is perfect for me because it’s quite gentle, fragrance & alcohol free + very hydrating. I do the 60 second rule with this and the results are outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Armando

customer_reviews.title: Not for damaged skin
customer_reviews.text: Very silky texture and easy to use. However, I found this to be too harsh on my sensitive, irritated skin. It leaves my skin feeling dry and tight. Since I have started retinol, I find that this causes a slight sting when I used it. This lives in my shower just until I use it up, but it is not my main cleanser anymore.
customer_reviews.author: LisaVH

customer_reviews.title: Nice and gentle cleanser...a little too gentle for makeup
customer_reviews.text: I really like this for my morning wash. Its creamy, gentle and does not irritate my eyes. But it is not able to take of make up. For taking my make up off I usually use an oil based cleanser and then use a second cleanser. And I hoped to use this as my second cleanser. But I noticed that it cannot give me a clean face even if I use this as a second cleanse. But I love how my skin feels after I use this on "no makeup" days.
customer_reviews.author: Mariaz

customer_reviews.title: Just because it's from my country doesn't mean it good!
customer_reviews.text: Non scented, great lather but not necessary for cleansing. Too much cost for average cleansing. Bio hylauronic has been used in Asian skincare for decades. Initially, Shiseido introduced the product for my skincare and it worked very well. I continue to use Shiseido, and probably try to find a cleanser for my skin type.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret A Mayer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Its whips up really thick in your palms, a little bit of product goes a long way! It leaves you feeling squeaky clean, so there's not much more I can ask for! I don't know how well it takes off makeup, since I oil cleanse before I use this. But, it takes the oil cleanser off well!
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Gentle but maybe TOO gentle?
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive dry skin, always had dry skin however now sensitive after pregnancy. This does a great job at keeping your skin and a good ph and not stripping or or overly drying it. I LOVE that there’s no scent and it doesn’t foam up to much just a nice gentle lather. This is non irritating and just a over all good product it didn’t get a 5 star because I just didn’t feel like it made my skin feel clean, perhaps it is TOO gentle for me but it is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: khristy villacis

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This along with the hada labo cleansing oil has seemed to help clear my skin in like 3 days. Only thing I've changed in my routine and my skin is so much happier. A tiny amount goes such a long way it'll last a long time! Love it. Fragrance free too which is exactly what you need to sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Owens

customer_reviews.title: Gentle but strong enough to remove impurities, and not overly-drying!
customer_reviews.text: Love this face wash. I have combination/oily skin and I've been looking for a good gentle face wash to use after I wash up my makeup off with an oil makeup remover, as a double cleanse. This is perfect. Doesn't have any weird scents. My face doesn't feel parched afterwards. Definitely removes the oil and gunk off my face well. Foams nicely also. I was a bit skeptical with the new American branding because I usually buy Hadalabo from Japan, but this is a great product! Will be repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Tomomi Mori

customer_reviews.title: My absolute fave cleanser! Great price point!
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to cleanser. I’ve tried others from the grocery store and just can not find a replacement. I originally found this cleanser when trying to find a less expensive option for my other favorite from Clarins. This has replaced that one. Wish I could buy it in stores!
customer_reviews.author: ACobs73

customer_reviews.title: The Best Cleanser Ever Made!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this cleanser for years and I absolutely love it! It lathers up into a creamy foam and removes all makeup. It’s gentle yet effective - perfect for most skin types. My teen daughter and I both use it - it’s works great on her oily acne-prone skin and on my combination middle-aged skin. I will never be without it!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Gentle, non-drying, and a little goes a long way! Great for acne prone skin.
customer_reviews.text: Gentle, no perfume scent, doesn't dry out my skin even though it is oil-free, and it doesn't cause my very acne prone skin to breakout. A very little goes a long way. I can easily wash my face with a pea size amount of product. I use this with my other oil-free skin routine products (serum, toner, acne treatment, and spf/moisturizer) and I haven't had a breakout in months. Fantastic face wash.
customer_reviews.author: Gabi

customer_reviews.title: Love the product, not the price..
customer_reviews.text: Hands down love this cleanser. It is so gentle on my sensitive skin. But powerful enough to deep clean. I am so disappointed to find out the price has sky rocketed to $25. Why I don't know, but I previously paid 10.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice, especially for summer
customer_reviews.text: first time using Hada Labo. here's my review: 1. It doesn't have fragrance. At first i tried it on my hands and it did a great job of cleaning. All you need is pea-sized usage. So the price seems reasonable. 2. Later I tried it on my face. it's nice. It's just NOT hydrating enough. but then you can always use a moisturizer. anyway, in summer, this cleanser would be a nice fit but in a dry winter, you can think twice about it.
customer_reviews.author: Y. L.

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and hydrating
customer_reviews.text: My skin is dry, sensitive, and acne prone. This cleanses my skin without stripping it of its moisture barrier (which is difficult to maintain for me), and there are no added scents that could irritate my skin. I wear very little makeup, and this removes what I do wear completely. This would probably be a bad choice if your skin is oily. If you wear a lot of makeup you would probably benefit from using this as part of a double cleanse routine (oil cleanser first). This is the perfect cleanser for me though and I’ll definitely repurchase. So far I’m never let down by Hada Labo products, they’re all simple but very effective.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Gentle, hydrating, effective.
customer_reviews.text: Very gentle and hydrating. No alcohol. Superior to American cleansers. I use this in the PM after oil cleanse. PM Regimen: Oil cleanse, cleanse with this one, tone, serum, moisturize + few drops of rosehip oil.
customer_reviews.author: EH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gentle cleanser. Holy grail status.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried both this one and the other Hada Labo foaming cleanser. This one is much better. It is so gentle on the skin, leaving your skin feeling soft & clean. It's the one consistent in my skincare routine and I'll be using it for as long as the company produces it. Definitely a holy grail.
customer_reviews.author: HKG

customer_reviews.title: So good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this face wash for about a month now. It feels really nice on my skin. I have sensitive skin and it has not caused any breakouts or sensitivity at all. A little bit goes such a long way. My only complaint is the smell, because it is unscented it has kind of a weird smell. I still love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and good cleansing
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a gentle cleanser as I use automatic facial brush and exfoliator on a regular basis. I didn't want to over cleanse. This is a perfect cleanser to use twice a day. I like that the smell is mild too.
customer_reviews.author: ALICE WAND

customer_reviews.title: At first, it worked. Days later, irritation occurs
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this because of the nice reviews it has, and it worked well as many people described it. Days later, my skin started burning and itching to the point that it made me wake up one night to scratch my face. The only positive thing I see from this product is that it is completely odorless and it doesn't make the skin dry. It is really sad :(
customer_reviews.author: Indyfunky

customer_reviews.title: XLNT face cleanser
customer_reviews.text: This is the face cleanser to use if you have sensitive skin. Doesn't dry skin. Foams up easily when applying with water. Doesn't leave a residue. Better than most facial cleansers I have used.
customer_reviews.author: xxx

customer_reviews.title: It’s OKAY
customer_reviews.text: The product was okay. Nothing special I do prefer my vanicream gentle cleanser a thousand times better but this still gets the job done. I am thankful the seller allows returns so a plus star for that!
customer_reviews.author: Anabella oliver

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I tried this facewash out recently for the first time, and I really love it. First, I barely have to use any (literally a pea sized amount is more than enough to cover my whole face). This is great because it means I don’t use a ton of product and run through it really quickly! It lathers nicely after it’s been rubbed on the skin a bit, and it just feels really smooth and creamy, which I love. I definitely can feel my skin feeling softer as I massage it into my skin! Definitely a good product, it has a lot more moisture than any other facewash I’ve tried!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: ... it has a low pH and I cannot be happier than I did
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cleanser because it has a low pH and I cannot be happier than I did! Used in conjunction with a Konjac sponge, a pea-sized dollop foams just the right amount and gently cleans my face without irritation, residue, or dryness afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Husband’s rosacea not visible after use!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my husband and me to use, but he has rosacea and it’s been hard to find a product that works for both of us. This stuff has worked wonderfully for my husband! His face would be itchy, dry, and so red across his cheeks and forehead, but his nose would be oily. He could clean his face with other products, but it would always leave his face red like a bad sunburn. The pH of this product is exactly why we tried it, and it worked, so I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Colton and Tierney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my combination, sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a combination oily t-zone, normal cheeks. Although since I currently have acne, my cheeks are a bit sensitive. There is no itching, burning, tightness, or redness when I use this cleanser, it’s awesome! Strong enough to clean my t-zone, but gentle enough for my cheeks. It doesn’t have any fragrance, and even a little pea sized amount foams up a great deal to spread on your face! However, if you have very oily skin, do be careful! This may not be the right cleanser for your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa B.

customer_reviews.title: Best face wash
customer_reviews.text: So far the favorite cleanser I have used. A little bit of this stuff goes a long way! A literal pea sized amount is plenty for washing my face. My skin feels very clean but not dried out after washing, and I love that there’s no fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Basically Scentless, Very Drying
customer_reviews.text: I tried (and am still trying this product) and it was very drying. My facial skin was left parched, certainly not gently hydrated. If I find some way for it to be useful, I'll update this review but for now its making me ashy. Ion like that. On the neutral side of things, the formula is thick and doesn't have much of a scent.
customer_reviews.author: Arri

customer_reviews.title: Gentle & Cleansing
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most gentle and hydrating cleansers I have ever used.I have tried other "gentle" cleansers that feel like they don't leave my face clean, but that was not the case with this one. I have been having trouble with dry and slightly peeling skin and have been using this face wash for a little over a week along with a mositurizer that contains niaminacides (hope I spelled that right) and my complexion has improved noticably. I would recommend this to people to have dryer skin.
customer_reviews.author: CrashedMan

customer_reviews.title: Been using it for at least two years
customer_reviews.text: This is very gentle and it doesn't really dry up your face. You don't need a lot to use it, maybe only a pea size amount for your face. We used it in the morning and night.
customer_reviews.author: jedmaine

customer_reviews.title: it lathers alot
customer_reviews.text: this stuff is amazing a LITTLE BIT goes a long way. I still have to use a separate product to exfoliate due to this being very gentle. I still prefer my Paul Choice Unscrub but this is way more affordable and does the same thing
customer_reviews.author: Vrom

customer_reviews.title: One of the BEST cleansers out there, by far!
customer_reviews.text: Such a wonderful cleanser. What I love about it: -The foam is rich and CREAMY -Less the pea size about goes a longgggg way... It's insane how much this lathers up! -Gentle as can be, as it claims -Removes everything and anything <3 If you have acne prone, sensitive, or dry skin this product will be your new true love in regards to cleansers :)
customer_reviews.author: Sienna Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: The Best Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cleanser I’ve ever had. I don’t need a separate exfoliater-although I do use it with a rotating brush. My skin feels clean, soft and fresh. Exactly what I was looking for. I’m going to buy this as long as they make it. My super picky husband likes it too. Plus the price is great.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I love the texture and moisturizing feel if this cleanser. The only thing I don’t love is the way it comes out of the tube. Not a great delivery system because it’s so thick.
customer_reviews.author: Laura G

customer_reviews.title: Great cleanser!
customer_reviews.text: I like how easily this removes the dirt and makeup at the end of the day. It works better than all cleansers that I have tried from the drug store and is very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect face wash for all skin types
customer_reviews.text: The best thing I’ve ever done for my skin. Love that it does’t lather, doesn’t have a fragrance, does an excellent job at removing my make up while moisturizing my combo skin. Price has gone up significantly since I first bought this product. Hate the price increase but will continue to but this product as it is my holy grail facial wash.
customer_reviews.author: rbrown

customer_reviews.title: Excellent non-scented, silky, oil removing, non-drying, decadence at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I love this face wash. It is scent free, non drying, and leaves my skin feeling clean and smooth. Great value because you only need a dime sized squirt. It lathers up quite a bit, which I like.
customer_reviews.author: likesmyalpacas

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and hydrating
customer_reviews.text: I really like this face wash! It kinda has the consistency of conditioner but it lathers really well so a little goes a long way. I use this with a face scrubbing brush and it always leaves my skin super soft and hydrated. I really like this and it seems to do well for my dry skin. I will be purchasing this again.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great non-drying PH-balanced cleanser
customer_reviews.text: This cleanser is amazing, it's better for your skin than all of those department store brands, like Clinique, Estee lauder etc. because those just dry our your skin and dis-balance your skin's PH-level which causes breakouts, dryness, etc. This is my second bottle and I am very pleased with results, it lasts forever too!
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Good cleanser
customer_reviews.text: This is a good cleanser but I gave it a 3 stars, as it is not that great if you use stains on your lips - doesn't clean as well. Works great for other make up.
customer_reviews.author: Deal Diva

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive and acne-prone skin!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for well over three months now and it has done wonders for my skin. It keeps me from breaking out and leaves my skin looking bright and healthy. The only time I break out is when I skip washing my face with it. I would 100% recommend this to anyone who's struggling to keep their skin demons at bay!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Best cleanser I found in a long time.
customer_reviews.text: After trying a few facial cleansers I'm going to stick with this one. My skin doesn't feel too dry or greasy after using it and it rinsed away clean with no film feeling. I've been using it for a couple months now and like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: I love this cleanser!
customer_reviews.text: This cleanser is amazing! I hope Amazon continues to sell it for such a low price. It’s very thick but foams up incredibly well and my skin hasn’t felt dry yet. I may have found my go-to cleanser!!!
customer_reviews.author: •sky•

customer_reviews.title: Nice basic cleanser!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice cleanser! It foams but is not drying. I have pretty sensitive skin and eyes, and it removes makeup/dirt/oil and never irritates either eyes or face. I would definitely repurchase. The Hado Labo line is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Gave me terrible cystic acne
customer_reviews.text: I quite liked this cleanser until I realized it was giving me terrible terrible cystic acne all over my cheeks. I get cystic acne once in a while but never on my cheeks before and never about 10 at a time. Others have said it’s because of the cocamidopropyl betaine, which comes from coconut oil. Entirely possible as coconut oil is hugely comedogenic for me. If it’s the same for you, watch out.
customer_reviews.author: YWA

customer_reviews.title: New Favorite Face Clenser !
customer_reviews.text: Bought 4 of them ! I like to have this option and any other exfoliating product. Also! Been super helped with wearing a mask most of the day now. No breakouts ! ✨
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Good cleanser
customer_reviews.text: This cleanser gets the face clean yet keeps it soft, without stripping the face. It appears the lines on my forehead are less prominent after about 1 month of using this product. There is no scent but that makes the smell a little strange as it must be the smell of the chemicals in the product which would be masked by a pleasant fragrance, if one were added. Overall, a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Atlana

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and effective cleanser!  A little bit goes a long way!
customer_reviews.text: Love that its fragrance free and creamy. Plus, it doesn't strip my skin too!
customer_reviews.author: bellemoua

customer_reviews.title: Great Face Wash!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this face wash and would recommend trying it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Drass

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I love this face cleanser, it reminds me of the First Aid Beauty cleanser. This has absolutely no scent, is hydrating, and gets everything off of my face!
customer_reviews.author: Ambern05

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very economical as a very small amount lathers wonderfully. Cleanses makeup very well. Leaves my skin feeling very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I like this because it is fragrance free, but I think it would best best for someone with combination skin. It is just ever so slightly stripping and a leaves skin feeling slightly “squeaky” clean. I prefer cerave hydrating cleanser. I also won’t purchase again for ethical reason because I discovered it contains mica.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: worked well without drying, but felt boring to use... just not for me. After using this I realized I prefer SOME kind of scent, even if it's just a tiny bit of essential oil. But I can see how this would be great for people who are highly sensitive to texture, color, or fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Cook

customer_reviews.title: WORKS BEAUTIFULLY-GREAT VALUE TRANSFORMED MY SKIN!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, effective cleanser! It really cleans your skin, lasts forever, and you can’t beat the price! It’s transfirmed my skin!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi elder

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite! It is super gentle
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite! It is super gentle, moisturizing, and leaves my skin feeling so so soft. Might not be the best choice for you though if you have acne or breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: KSSC

customer_reviews.title: I received a sample and found that I really liked this cleanser so I went looking to buy it ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonerful prouct. I received a sample and found that I really liked this cleanser so I went looking to buy it on line an found it on Amazon. Great price and fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Golden

customer_reviews.title: Warning! This contains Methylisothiazolinone !!!
customer_reviews.text: This used to be my go-to face wash for years but I only just started paying attention to the ingredients and noticed it has Methylisothiazolinone (MIT) which is a common preservative found in many liquid personal care products, and has been linked to lung toxicity, allergic reactions and possible neurotoxicity. I’m saddened by the realization and will be on the lookout to buy a new foam wash that doesn’t contain preservatives. -Wish me luck because I will need it!
customer_reviews.author: mmx

customer_reviews.title: Addicting cleanser
customer_reviews.text: So creamy and foamy. Feels like silk on the skin! I gave up my double cleansing method to use this only.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Great Cleanser, Been Using It For About A Year Now
customer_reviews.text: This 5oz bottle will last me around 3-4 months of daily use. I wash my face two times a day and this stuff is a great gentle daily cleanser that doesn't leave my skin too dry or too oily after use. It's pretty much fragrance free. It's a cream in the bottle so you need to wet your face a bit to get it to start foaming. A little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.author: Ess_

customer_reviews.title: Definitely for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: This product is the bomb. If you have very sensitive skin like me try this. It leaves your skin clean , smooth and supple. No redness !!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lourdes

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't dry my face out like other products and I moisturize right after using
customer_reviews.text: gentle but effective! I noticed clearer, more even skin tone within a few uses. It doesn't dry my face out like other products and I moisturize right after using. It's gentle enough to use everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very gentle and calming on the skin! Leaves my skin feeling smooth
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Great, great cleanser. Foams up quite a bit, but does not leave the skin dry whatsoever. Does a great job removing make-up and grime from the day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best cream based cleanser without drying skin
customer_reviews.text: My face is extremely dry yet extremely sensitive. Glycerin based cleansers always dry out my skin and anything with alpha hydroxy in it burns and reddens my skin. This cleanser only takes a small little dab and it leaves my skin clean and soft, no redness, no dryness. I believe this can be used on any type of complex to normal skin types.
customer_reviews.author: DJSEPT15

customer_reviews.title: Facial wash
customer_reviews.text: A small amount goes a long way. This product cleans the skin very well and makes shaving very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Paul924

customer_reviews.title: This Gentle Hydrating Cleanser Delivers on Its Promises
customer_reviews.text: As promised, this cleanser by Hada Labo Tokyo is hydrating and gentle to my sensitive skin. A little goes a long way as well. I've used it with a facecloth and with my hands, and the results are the same. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SSG

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: After using this just one time my eyes and face burned immediately and I broke out in small pimples overnight. I love the Hada gel moisturizer so I thought I would try this. I can't even use it a second time. Not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Hmmm
customer_reviews.text: Lots of weird chemicals in it. Not sure if I'm going to use it. Kind of afraid to. Probably give it away or toss it.
customer_reviews.author: WilliVanilli

customer_reviews.title: love this product
customer_reviews.text: been using this for a hilt...love this stuff....make my face feel soft and clean ..
customer_reviews.author: sheila

customer_reviews.title: My favorite face wash
customer_reviews.text: Very gentle and good for removing makeup! My skin never feels tight after washing and cleans very well
customer_reviews.author: Mayra

customer_reviews.title: Okay product, good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This product works well if you're double cleansing with oil first, but on it's own it's okay, not great. It doesn't leave my skin feeling particularly hydrated after - quite the opposite after, it feels slightly dehydrated. Overall, it's good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Atalia L.

product_meta.title: Hada Labo Tokyo Gentle Hydrating Cleanser 5 Oz - with Hyaluronic Acid cream facial wash non-drying free from fragrance parabens alcohol mineral oil and dyes (Packaging May Vary)
product_meta.description: Size:5 OunceThe #1 Skincare Line in Japan brings the THE JAPANESE SECRET FOR AGELESS - SKIN. SKINCARE THAT WORKS IN HARMONY WITH YOUR SKIN - The Japanese beauty philosophy is rooted in the idea that products should work in harmony with skin. Inspired by this philosophy, Hada Labo Tokyo is designed to replace a key element of what your skin naturally loses over time - hyaluronic acid - but with a sophisticated innovation. Featuring Super Hyaluronic Acid an exclusive combination of three types of hyaluronic acid, Hada Labo Tokyo offers powerful multi-layer hydration to effectively reduce dry lines, wrinkles and restore radiance. This anti-aging collection emphasizes simplicity in its design by removing unnecessary ingredients that can burden the skin. All formulas are Fragrance-Free, Paraben-Free, Dye-Free, Mineral Oil-Free.
feature_bullets: GENTLE AND HYDRATING FACIAL WASH This luxurious japanese facial wash offers a deep and purifying skin cleansing experience. It washes away dirt, oil, make-up and impurities from the skin while protecting and locking in essential moisture. Skin is left feeling clean, refreshed, silky-smooth, and healthy looking. Layer with our hydrator or gel cream for all day dewy skin.

HYDRATED SKIN IS HAPPY SKIN This facial wash is water based and it's formulated with Hyaluronic Acid to work in harmony with your skin and retain skin's moisture. Hyaluronic Acid is a substance naturally occurring in the human body that attracts and binds water. It is capable of holding up to 1,000 times its own weight in water. By capturing water, it plays a very important role in keeping skin smooth and plump.

A TRUE JAPANESE FACIAL WASH EXPERIENCE True to its origin's traditions of quality and efficacy, this facial wash offers a unique experience; rich, skin-cushioning and creamy, it quickly creates a soft foam when in contact with water yet rinses easily, and leaves no residue on the skin. A little goes a long way to keep your skin clean and moist morning and night.

ONLY WHAT YOUR SKIN REALLY NEEDS No unnecessary ingredients that can burden the skin makes this facial wash the perfect choice for any skin type. This product is free from fragrance, parabens, alcohol, dyes, mineral oil, and it is suitable for even sensitive or rosecea prone skin.

ONLY WHAT YOUR SKIN REALLY NEEDS No unnecessary ingredients that can burden the skin makes this facial wash the perfect choice for any skin type. This product is free from fragrance, parabens, alcohol, dyes, mineral oil, and it is suitable for even sensitive or rosecea prone skin.

specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
